I have made a plead with to be the media hero in this story to report the absolute truth. You all are being fed a pack of lies...including facts by omission. These people are far from terrorists...quite the contrary. Wake the hell up and learn the truth...instead of listenting to the lamestream media directed at your sympathies. Geez...I'm really tired of trying to get the message across...but here's the latest that includes FBI interteraction...in long detail. Bother to learn...or bury your head.
